title: Solo/Flex Q
body: When i q as flex playing alone, can i encounter in my enemy/ally team solo q players?

replies.body: What DarkRitual said!  https://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/emoticons/v1/117484/1.0  You can queue up solo in Flex and it's possible that you might find others, but expect to see more premades.  Your best bet is to stick to Solo Q if you're looking solo adventurers.  I hope that helps!
The queues are seperate, so if you queue up for flex, you'll only ever play with and against others who queued up in flex.
